text: 18.16: VB 17.4Mbe khaŋ suanga, ‘Khue! Khue, bigɨna mbatɨga guareŋra mbu ŋgu bakɨmen hɨgi! Ana fhum won sɨɨn vhuuaŋ mbuav, won rinen shagi huri sharav, won shagir ŋkarɨɨiŋ gum shagir hɨvi shargi. Ana nta sharav, sɨɨn vhuun wo fhava mbuav, gorar won fhava nzɨɨav, ŋkɨɨr vhuuin wo nzɨɨav, vhɨra guigira vhez vun ndagi karɨgir wo sɨɨŋgi.
